message_2:
To simplify the square root of 72, we can find the prime factors of 72 and look for any pairs of the same factor.

72 = 2 × 2 × 2 × 3 × 3

We have two pairs of the same factor: 2 × 2 and 3 × 3. We can rewrite the square root of 72 as:

√(2 × 2 × 2 × 3 × 3) = √(2² × 2 × 3²)

Now, we can take the square root of each pair of the same factor:

2 × 3 = 6

So, the simplified square root of 72 is 6√2.
